name: Backend Engineer
short_description: Designs and implements server-side logic, APIs, and database architecture. Ensures scalability, performance, and security of backend systems.

name: Frontend Engineer
short_description: Builds user interfaces and client-side applications. Focuses on responsive design, performance optimization, and user experience.

name: Full Stack Engineer
short_description: Works across both frontend and backend systems. Develops end-to-end features and understands the complete application lifecycle.

name: Mobile Developer
short_description: Creates native or cross-platform mobile applications. Specializes in iOS, Android, or frameworks like React Native and Flutter.

name: DevOps Engineer
short_description: Manages CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure automation, and deployment processes. Bridges development and operations teams.

name: Site Reliability Engineer
short_description: Ensures system reliability, availability, and performance at scale. Implements monitoring, incident response, and capacity planning.

name: Data Engineer
short_description: Builds and maintains data pipelines, warehouses, and ETL processes. Ensures data quality and accessibility for analytics.

name: Data Scientist
short_description: Analyzes complex datasets to extract insights and build predictive models. Combines statistics, machine learning, and domain expertise.

name: Machine Learning Engineer
short_description: Develops and deploys machine learning models at scale. Focuses on model training, optimization, and production infrastructure.

name: AI Research Scientist
short_description: Conducts research in artificial intelligence and publishes findings. Develops novel algorithms and advances state-of-the-art techniques.

name: Cloud Architect
short_description: Designs cloud infrastructure and migration strategies. Specializes in AWS, Azure, or GCP solutions and cost optimization.

name: Security Engineer
short_description: Protects systems from vulnerabilities and attacks. Implements security protocols, conducts audits, and responds to incidents.

name: Penetration Tester
short_description: Simulates attacks to identify security weaknesses. Performs ethical hacking and provides remediation recommendations.

name: Product Manager
short_description: Defines product vision, strategy, and roadmap. Coordinates between engineering, design, and business stakeholders.

name: Engineering Manager
short_description: Leads engineering teams and manages technical delivery. Balances people management with technical leadership.

name: Systems Engineer
short_description: Designs and maintains operating systems, networks, and infrastructure. Focuses on performance, reliability, and security.

name: Database Administrator
short_description: Manages database systems, performance tuning, and backup strategies. Ensures data integrity and availability.

name: Blockchain Developer
short_description: Develops decentralized applications and smart contracts. Works with blockchain protocols and cryptocurrency systems.

name: Embedded Systems Engineer
short_description: Programs firmware and hardware interfaces for embedded devices. Works on IoT, robotics, and low-level system programming.

name: QA Engineer
short_description: Designs and executes test plans to ensure software quality. Implements automated testing frameworks and CI integration.

name: Solutions Architect
short_description: Designs end-to-end technical solutions for client requirements. Bridges business needs with technical implementation.

name: Quantitative Analyst
short_description: Develops mathematical models for financial markets and trading strategies. Uses statistics and programming for risk analysis.

name: Algorithmic Trader
short_description: Builds automated trading systems and strategies. Combines finance knowledge with software engineering and data analysis.

name: Computer Vision Engineer
short_description: Develops image and video processing systems. Applies deep learning for object detection, segmentation, and recognition.

name: NLP Engineer
short_description: Builds natural language processing systems for text understanding and generation. Works with transformers, LLMs, and language models.

name: Game Developer
short_description: Creates video games and interactive experiences. Works with game engines, physics, graphics, and gameplay mechanics.

name: Data Analyst
short_description: Analyzes data to provide business insights and recommendations. Creates dashboards, reports, and visualizations.

name: Business Intelligence Engineer
short_description: Builds BI systems and data warehouses for analytics. Develops reporting solutions and data visualization tools.

name: Platform Engineer
short_description: Builds internal platforms and developer tools. Improves engineering productivity through automation and infrastructure.

name: Technical Writer
short_description: Creates technical documentation, API references, and user guides. Translates complex technical concepts into clear content.
